title.narrative: PBF showcase project in Borana, phase 2

description.narrative: A total of 488.556 people living in the catchment area of (maximum) 25 targeted Health Facilities (or a total of 793,365 people, if we take the total catchment population of the two hospitals included in Phase II) in the 8 project Woredas will benefit from the project implementation.
The aim is to continue with the Borana showcase PBF project, while engaging with FMOH & EHIA to integrate PBF in Health Sector Transformation Plan for upscaling PBF approach.

This is an extension of the PBF showcase project in the Borana zone in Ethiopia. The plan is that the project will be extended for two years with Memisa funds, starting on the 1st of July 2018. For 2018 therefore an amount of Euro 450.000 is reserved, while for 2019 an Memisa amount of Euro 600.000 will be requested.

mailing-address.narrative: Grote Marktstraat 45, Den Haag, Zuid Holland, 2511 BH

title.narrative: Health Thematic Indicators
Number of women, girls, boys, men, on modern short-term family planning methods - Number of personnes sur les méthodes modernes de PF à court terme (visites nouvelles et répétées)

Number of women of reproductive age, girls, boy and men on modern long term or permanent family planning methods - Number of personnes sur les méthodes de PF modernes à long terme ou permanentes (visites nouvelles et répétées)
Number of cases treated for STI - Number of cas traités pour IST (pas le VIH)

description.narrative: Number of cases treated for STI (not HIV) at a health facility supported by a Cordaid Health Programme

title.narrative: Number of new confirmed TB cases - Number of de nouveaux cas de tuberculose confirmés
